channel.title: Inferno Scape! Looking For New Members
channel.description:
[b] InfernoScape is a server that is designed for the player. Inferno Scape is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and minigames. You can do whatever pleases you on Inferno Scape, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! The server is economized strategically so that no item that can be obtained by a boss or minigame, is in a shop. Another great concept is our PvP system. We have designed it so that when you kill someone, you get a random number out of 5, PvP Points. This provides the thrill we all loved when we k03d that special someone in the wilderness. We hope you enjoy your stay at Inferno Scape! What are you waiting for? Play Now!
Website - [url=http://www.infernoscape.net/]http://www.infernoscape.net/[/url]
yes its free domain but ill have proper domain within a week or so Come Play And Have Fun!
Pictures will be added Asap!
Features:
Mage Following Range Following Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Reworked Defence Formulas - PvP Reworked Attack Formulas - PvP & PvN Amazing Switching Rewritten Fishing Gem Cutting Improved Woodcutting Mining Smelting Smithing Fletching Herblore Agility Firemaking Crafting Fishing & Cooking Prayer Correct Drops PvP Point System PvP Point Shops Old School Styled Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Cook's Assistant Quest Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working All Ladders Working Custom Donator Crown Working Custom Server Name Image in Chatbox New Friends & Ignore Lists ...And much more! [/b]

item.title: Inferno Scape! Looking For New Members
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Null Amount:

Try adding some media. Just having a list of features can drive quite a few potential players away from your server. Right now it looks quite bland.

This and upgrade your website from webs to something better.

Read full topic

item.title: Inferno Scape! Looking For New Members

item.description:
@s_p_a_r_kz wrote:

[b]
InfernoScape is a server that is designed for the player. Inferno Scape is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and minigames. You can do whatever pleases you on Inferno Scape, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! The server is economized strategically so that no item that can be obtained by a boss or minigame, is in a shop. Another great concept is our PvP system. We have designed it so that when you kill someone, you get a random number out of 5, PvP Points. This provides the thrill we all loved when we k03d that special someone in the wilderness. We hope you enjoy your stay at Inferno Scape! What are you waiting for? Play Now!

Website - http://www.infernoscape.net/

yes its free domain but ill have proper domain within a week or so Come Play And Have Fun!

Pictures will be added Asap!

Features:

Mage Following
Range Following
Clipped Projectiles
Clipped Following
Clipped Npcs
Reworked Defence Formulas - PvP
Reworked Attack Formulas - PvP & PvN
Amazing Switching
Rewritten Fishing

Mining

Smithing

…And much more! [/b]
